name: Caring Too Much!
description:
This game is made for Ludum Dare 40th Compo.
By: Stephano, Twitter: RedMug_ Twitch: red_mug

This game is about caring for old people.
You need to give them a shower or give them food in the right order,
If you do it right you get points, if not you get -points.

Everytime the spawn cooldown will become less and less.

Good Luck!!

Kind regards: Stephan
